content: It's time people stopped hiding behind the events of 11 Sep 01. We were asleep at the switch, the bad guys got in, and that's how it happened. Piling all these layers over it as we have over the past eight years does not speak well of us as a nation. And it certainly looks bad when we allow ourselves to compromise our principles as a result. It's very easy to get lazy and make excuses to justify illegal behavior, when we should be doing the right thing. And we know what the right thing is - we codified it. Ronald Reagan knew what the right thing was - he signed the public law that was informed by the Geneva Conventions. Not a single illegal act that has been done in the name of 9/11, despite the claim that "it works", is justifiable when one takes the long view of those actions and their effect on our society internally and externally. And it's very disheartening to see that we have wasted so much time and effort with distractions that make us look even smaller as a people. Again - why is Nancy Pelosi an issue? So, she "lied". I can think of all the people who were at the tip of the spear who lied also - and they were the ones who decided that our values and principles were secondary to their personal desires. So, again: It matters not what you personally think is permissible. We are allegedly a nation of laws, not of men. We don't wake up and decide which laws we're going to abide by and which ones are impediments to our motivations. Ladies and gentlemen, that's what criminals do. That's what psychopaths do. Have we become those things?

content: It's time people stopped hiding behind the events of 11 Sep 01. We were asleep at the switch, the bad guys got in, and that's how it happened. Piling all these layers over it as we have over the past eight years does not speak well of us as a nation. And it certainly looks bad when we allow ourselves to compromise our principles as a result. It's very easy to get lazy and make excuses to justify illegal behavior, when we should be doing the right thing. And we know what the right thing is - we codified it. Ronald Reagan knew what the right thing was - he signed the public law that was informed by the Geneva Conventions. Not a single illegal act that has been done in the name of 9/11, despite the claim that "it works", is justifiable when one takes the long view of those actions and their effect on our society internally and externally. And it's very disheartening to see that we have wasted so much time and effort with distractions that make us look even smaller as a people. Again - why is Nancy Pelosi an issue? So, she "lied". I can think of all the people who were at the tip of the spear who lied also - and they were the ones who decided that our values and principles were secondary to their personal desires. So, again: It matters not what you personally think is permissible. We are allegedly a nation of laws, not of men. We don't wake up and decide which laws we're going to abide by and which ones are impediments to our motivations. Ladies and gentlemen, that's what criminals do. That's what psychopaths do. Have we become those things?

content: It's time people stopped hiding behind the events of 11 Sep 01. We were asleep at the switch, the bad guys got in, and that's how it happened. Piling all these layers over it as we have over the past eight years does not speak well of us as a nation. And it certainly looks bad when we allow ourselves to compromise our principles as a result. It's very easy to get lazy and make excuses to justify illegal behavior, when we should be doing the right thing. And we know what the right thing is - we codified it. Ronald Reagan knew what the right thing was - he signed the public law that was informed by the Geneva Conventions. Not a single illegal act that has been done in the name of 9/11, despite the claim that "it works", is justifiable when one takes the long view of those actions and their effect on our society internally and externally. And it's very disheartening to see that we have wasted so much time and effort with distractions that make us look even smaller as a people. Again - why is Nancy Pelosi an issue? So, she "lied". I can think of all the people who were at the tip of the spear who lied also - and they were the ones who decided that our values and principles were secondary to their personal desires. So, again: It matters not what you personally think is permissible. We are allegedly a nation of laws, not of men. We don't wake up and decide which laws we're going to abide by and which ones are impediments to our motivations. Ladies and gentlemen, that's what criminals do. That's what psychopaths do. Have we become those things?

content: It's time people stopped hiding behind the events of 11 Sep 01. We were asleep at the switch, the bad guys got in, and that's how it happened. Piling all these layers over it as we have over the past eight years does not speak well of us as a nation. And it certainly looks bad when we allow ourselves to compromise our principles as a result. It's very easy to get lazy and make excuses to justify illegal behavior, when we should be doing the right thing. And we know what the right thing is - we codified it. Ronald Reagan knew what the right thing was - he signed the public law that was informed by the Geneva Conventions. Not a single illegal act that has been done in the name of 9/11, despite the claim that "it works", is justifiable when one takes the long view of those actions and their effect on our society internally and externally. And it's very disheartening to see that we have wasted so much time and effort with distractions that make us look even smaller as a people. Again - why is Nancy Pelosi an issue? So, she "lied". I can think of all the people who were at the tip of the spear who lied also - and they were the ones who decided that our values and principles were secondary to their personal desires. So, again: It matters not what you personally think is permissible. We are allegedly a nation of laws, not of men. We don't wake up and decide which laws we're going to abide by and which ones are impediments to our motivations. Ladies and gentlemen, that's what criminals do. That's what psychopaths do. Have we become those things?
